title: A proclamation of grace, for the inlargement of prisoners called Quakers
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the eleventh day of May, in the thirteenth year of our reign, 1661.
